title: Object - Stock Conversion Transaction
description: Records the conversion of an existing stock security into one or more new securities, specifying the quantity converted and resulting security identifiers.

balance_security_id.description: Identifier for the security that holds the remainder balance (for partial conversions)

quantity_converted.description: Quantity of non-monetary security units converted
